name: Campogiovanni Brunello di Montalcino
serverNotes: Excellent Brunello from San Felice's Campogiovanni estate. Rated 93 pts. 100% Sangiovese with dark cherry, leather, tobacco, spice. Full-bodied, structured, age-worthy. pronunciation: GAH-yah soo-gah-REEL-yay pee-AY-vay SAN-tah res-tee-TOO-tah broo-NELL-oh
